posts.post_content: Anyone have a complete or near complete set and they feel is the right time to sell?

Not sure if I'm ready to sell my T3 set, but there's one currently listed in the Lelands Auction

[url]https://auction.lelands.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=107784[/url]
Thanks, saw that one but would prefer a private deal vs that reserve auction. Keep me in mind if you ever decide it's time.
